about_the_game:
♥ Story


Kouta is a 21-year-old manga artist in a terrible position. He’s barely scraping by as it is, but when his work contract is broken for a ridiculous reason, he loses everything, including the roof over his head. But there is a way out! His unusually hot aunt, Keiko, offers Kouta a job – he needs to create an adaptation of an incest novel she once wrote for her. What could’ve been more simple? But she insists that to do his job properly, Kouta needs to stay home, at a place that he didn’t visit in years.
Although Kouta is reluctant, he is limited in his options. When he returns home, Kana and Nao, Kouta's younger sisters, are just as thrilled to see him as Keiko is. They can't wait to spend more time with him and demonstrate how much they have changed and grown while he was away.
What was supposed to be a work trip quickly turns into something much more devious, as each of the women in his family tries to seduce Kouta in their own ways. He can’t fight the desire that slowly grows between him and one of them. But who? That’s for you to decide.
Will you be seduced by more mature and insolent Keiko? Will you be smitten by the charming and daring Kana? Or will you decide to stick with shy and enigmatic Nao? Only you will decide that!

❤ Feature

♡ 155+ CGs, including more than 155+ differences

♡ 65,000 words of game text

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has adult themes, incest, pregnancy, adult language, and fictional characters depicted in adult situations and performing sexual acts.

It contains frequent nudity and revealing outfits, explicit references to sex or sexuality, sexual scenes and stories, dialogue and situations involving suggestive, incest, mature and adult themes and humor, fondling, kiss, adult humor.

In the game there are explicit and graphic depictions and descriptions of sexual acts (oral, vaginal, sleeping).

All characters depicted are over the age of 18.

He’s barely scraping by as it is, but when his work contract is broken for a ridiculous reason, he loses everything, including the roof over his head. But there is a way out! What was supposed to be a work trip quickly turns into something much more devious, as each of the women in his family tries to seduce Kouta in their own ways. He can’t fight the desire that slowly grows between him and one of them. But who? That’s for you to decide.

name: I Think I Wanna Have Your Baby

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: 1.8 GHz Pentium 4 equivalent or above
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9600 GS, Radeon HD 4000
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64bit)
  • Processor: intel Core 3.60GHz equivalent or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 260, Radeon HD 5770
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: You’re a struggling manga artist in trouble, but your aunt and two sisters are here to offer you a new job. Their only condition – you have to live with them while you work on your new creation. What could go wrong?
